product information:
HP introduces its most fundamental camera with 5MP, the PhotoSmart M415 with 3x optical zoom and 6x digital zoom. With a 1.5 inch TFT screen, choice of ISO levels, assorted effects, in-built red eye removal, it proves to be a highly efficient yet simplistic digital camera. Moreover, the dynamic lighting system and 8 shooting modes justify its suitability for the casual or more serious photographer.
